title: About WhatTheStack
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:t,jsxs:n}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(o){const r={a:"a",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...o.components};return n(e,{children:[t(r.h3,{children:"A by-developers, for-developers event in the heart of Skopje in September 19th, 2026"}),"
",t(r.p,{children:"Most of us in this game tend to be on the wallflower side of the spectrum. Still, you can't deny the (very obvious) benefits of having a community to support and cheer for you."}),"
",t(r.p,{children:"WhatTheStack, for us, is the culmination of combined 20 years of community building efforts. We love going to conferences, meeting new people, learning new things...but sometimes, we get this feeling that these kinds of events are starting to get a bit too formal for our community culture. That's why we decided to make our own conference with blackjack and...Ha, got you. We decided to make a conference that won't be just ours. A conference that will be made by the passion of all the people who will attend WhatTheStack? So, hackers, developers, platform engineers, AI researchers, startup founders, and whatever title you choose (or may have been chosen for you)... welcome."}),"
",n(r.p,{children:["WhatTheStack is a conference. Surprising, we know. More importantly, it's a single-day, multi-track event that aims to celebrate technology, the web platform, AI, infrastructure and everything else that makes the modern stack what it is. It's never going to be the kind that expects a dress code of you. It's also ",t(r.strong,{children:"stacked"})," with (pun very much intended) with authentic experiences, which may involve, but are not limited to:"]}),"
",n(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:[t(r.strong,{children:"Epic talks"})," - And not just by the big names, but the folks who genuinely love the craft. Expect authentic, genuine insights on the entire spectrum from familiar faces you know from the internet and newcomers alike (which you'll probably know on the internet in a few years anyway)."]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:[t(r.strong,{children:"Coffee"})," - Yes, we have it. Yes, it's good."]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:[t(r.strong,{children:"Beers and Chill"})," - Because let's face it, the best ideas sometimes come over a cold brew (and we mean beer this time). Or, y'know, just stick around for the chill part - soda's good too!"]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:[t(r.strong,{children:"Gourmet Grub"})," - C'mon, it's the Balkans. We know how to do food. Trust us, you'll try it and love it. You'll be back."]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:[t(r.strong,{children:"Community Vibes"})," - This is where you'll find your tribe. Whether you're flying solo or rolling with your crew, you're among friends here. We're all about the vibes."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.p,{children:["The ultimate goal for WhatTheStack is to become your yearly go-to conference. Since we're not we're not in the business of ","Promise","s (pun also very much intended), here's what we'll deliver:"]}),"
",n(r.ul,{children:["
",t(r.li,{children:"The epic talks mentioned above"}),"
",t(r.li,{children:"Coffee, beer, amazing food"}),"
",t(r.li,{children:"Great community and even better vibes"}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.p,{children:["... wait, you're still not convinced? Okay, fair enough. Shoot us a message at ",t(r.a,{href:"mailto:what@wts.rocks",children:"what@wts.rocks"})," or on any of our social media profiles."]}),"
",t(r.p,{children:"Alternatively: "})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:n}=e.components||{};return n?t(n,{...e,children:t(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Code of Conduct
content:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(o){const r={a:"a",h1:"h1",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",ul:"ul",...o.components};return i(n,{children:[e(r.h1,{children:"Code of Conduct"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"Citizen Code of Conduct"}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"1. Purpose"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"A primary goal of WhatTheStack is to be inclusive to the largest number of contributors, with the most varied and diverse backgrounds possible. We are committed to providing a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all."}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"2. Open [Source/Culture/Tech] Citizenship"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"Our supplemental goal is to increase open [source/culture/tech] citizenship by encouraging participants to recognize and strengthen the relationships between our actions and their effects on our community."}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"3. Expected Behavior"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:"Participate in an authentic and active way."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Exercise consideration and respect in your speech and actions."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Attempt collaboration before conflict."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Refrain from demeaning, discriminatory, or harassing behavior and speech."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Be mindful of your surroundings and of your fellow participants."}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"4. Unacceptable Behavior"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"The following behaviors are considered harassment and are unacceptable:"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:"Violence, threats, or violent language."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Discriminatory jokes and language."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Posting sexually explicit or violent material."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Doxing (posting private identifying information)."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Personal insults."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Inappropriate photography or recording."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Inappropriate physical contact (consent is required)."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Unwelcome sexual attention."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Deliberate intimidation, stalking or following."}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Advocating for or encouraging any of the above."}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"5. Weapons Policy"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"No weapons are allowed at WhatTheStack events or community spaces. This includes guns, explosives, and large knives."}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"6. Consequences of Unacceptable Behavior"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"Unacceptable behavior will not be tolerated. Anyone asked to stop is expected to comply immediately. Organizers may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including permanent expulsion from the community."}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"7. Reporting Guidelines"}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["If you witness or are subject to unacceptable behavior, notify a community organizer or contact us at ",e(r.a,{href:"mailto:what@wts.rocks",children:"what@wts.rocks"}),"."]}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"8. Addressing Grievances"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"If you feel falsely or unfairly accused, notify the organizer with a concise description of your grievance."}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"9. Scope"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"This code of conduct applies to all community participants in all community venues (online and in-person) and one-on-one communications pertaining to community business."}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"10. Contact Information"}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["Email: ",e(r.a,{href:"mailto:what@wts.rocks",children:"what@wts.rocks"})]})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:i}=n.components||{};return i?e(i,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};

title: Partner With Us
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const o={a:"a",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",p:"p",strong:"strong",...r.components};return t(e,{children:[n(o.h2,{children:"Partner With Us"}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Whether you're a startup looking to gain exposure, a company seeking to expand your reach or a fellow community builder looking to collaborate, we invite you to join us on this journey."}),"
",n(o.h2,{children:"Why Partner with WhatTheStack?"}),"
",t(o.p,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"WhatTheStack"})," is a community-driven event that brings together developers, designers, and virtually all other kinds of IT professionals. Whether you're looking to hire, promote a product, or simply connect with like-minded individuals, we offer a unique platform to achieve your goals."]}),"
",n(o.h2,{children:"Reach a Diverse Audience"}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Partnering with us gives you direct access to a highly engaged community of tech professionals. From junior developers to seasoned architects, our attendees are passionate about learning, networking, and discovering new tools and technologies."}),"
",n(o.h2,{children:"Showcase Your Brand"}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Position your brand at the forefront of the tech industry. Whether through booth presence, raffles, giveaways, or branding opportunities, we offer various ways to increase your visibility and connect with your target audience."}),"
",n(o.h2,{children:"Support the Local Tech Ecosystem"}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"By supporting WhatTheStack, you're investing in the growth and vibrancy of the local tech community. Help us create an environment where fresh ideas thrive and connections are made."}),"
",n(o.h2,{children:"Let's Collaborate"}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"We are open to creative partnership ideas. Have something specific in mind? Let's talk about how we can work together to create an awesome experience for everyone."}),"
",n(o.h3,{children:"Contact Us"}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Interested in becoming a partner? We'd love to hear from you!"}),"
",n(o.p,{children:n(o.a,{href:"mailto:partnerships@wts.sh",children:"> Send us an email at partnerships@wts.sh"})})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Privacy Policy
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const i={a:"a",h1:"h1",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...r.components};return t(e,{children:[n(i.h1,{children:"Privacy Policy"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"Privacy policy for WhatTheStack conference - how we handle your data"}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"Our Approach to Privacy"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"At WhatTheStack, we believe in transparency and minimalism when it comes to data collection. We only collect what’s absolutely necessary to provide you with the best conference experience."}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"What Data We Collect"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"We collect and process the following limited information:"}),"
",t(i.ul,{children:["
",t(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Name:"})," To identify you during the conference and on your ticket"]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Email address:"})," For important conference communications and updates"]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Company/Affiliation:"})," For your conference badge and basic analytics"]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Ticket information:"})," To verify your attendance"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"How We Use Your Data"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"Your data is used exclusively for:"}),"
",t(i.ul,{children:["
",t(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Conference Administration:"})," Ticket verification, attendee identification, emergency communications, and important updates."]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Communication:"})," Pre-conference information, schedule updates, and post-conference feedback requests."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"Consent and Voluntary Data Sharing"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"You may, at your sole discretion, elect to provide certain personal data to our conference partners, sponsors, or exhibitors. Such disclosures may occur, for example, by participating in giveaways, scanning QR codes, or opting in to receive communications. By doing so, you acknowledge and expressly consent to the transfer of your personal data to the relevant partner."}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"Data Protection"}),"
",t(i.ul,{children:["
",n(i.li,{children:"We do not sell your personal information."}),"
",n(i.li,{children:"We do not share your data with third parties without your permission."}),"
",n(i.li,{children:"We do not use your data for marketing purposes beyond the scope of the conference."}),"
",n(i.li,{children:"We do not track or profile our attendees."}),"
"]}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"Third-Party Services"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"We use the following third-party services:"}),"
",t(i.ul,{children:["
",t(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Hi.events (hi.events):"})," For ticket sales and registration, via a self-hosted instance."]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Stripe:"})," For payment processing."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"Your Rights"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"You have the right to access, request correction, or request deletion of your personal data. You may also withdraw your consent at any time."}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"Data Retention"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"We retain your data only for as long as necessary to facilitate your attendance, complete post-conference communications, and comply with legal obligations."}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"Requesting Data Deletion"}),"
",t(i.p,{children:["You can request deletion by emailing ",n(i.a,{href:"mailto:what@wts.rocks",children:"what@wts.rocks"}),' with "Data Deletion Request" in the subject line.']}),"
",n(i.h3,{children:"Contact Us"}),"
",t(i.p,{children:["Email: ",n(i.a,{href:"mailto:what@wts.rocks",children:"what@wts.rocks"}),"
Phone: +389 78 397 359
Address: 75 East 3rd Street Sheridan, WY 82801 United States"]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Terms and Conditions
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const r={a:"a",h1:"h1",h3:"h3",h4:"h4",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components};return t(e,{children:[n(r.h1,{children:"Terms and Conditions"}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"1. Introduction"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Welcome to the “WhatTheStack?” Conference organized by DeveD, Base42 and Angular Macedonia. The ticket sales for this conference are facilitated by Hi.events (hi.events) via a self-hosted instance and Stripe. By purchasing a ticket and participating in the conference, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"2. Organizer Information"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"The “WhatTheStack?” Conference is organized by:"}),"
",t(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"DeveD"}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Base42"}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Angular Macedonia"}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Sales are facilitated by:"}),"
",t(r.ul,{children:["
",t(r.li,{children:["A self-hosted instance of hi.events (",n(r.a,{href:"https://hi.events",children:"https://hi.events"}),")"]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Stripe"}),"
"]}),"
",t(r.p,{children:["The legal entity behind the conference is ",n(r.strong,{children:"CodePub LLC"}),", registered in the United States, with address:
75 East 3rd Street Sheridan, WY 82801 United States"]}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"3. Ticket Purchase"}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"3.1 General"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Tickets for the conference can be purchased online through Hi.eventt (hi.events) and Stripe. All ticket sales are final, and no refunds will be issued."}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"3.2 Payment"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"All payments are processed securely through our HiEvents instance and Stripe. By purchasing a ticket, you agree to their respective terms of service and privacy policies."}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"3.3 Confirmation"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Upon successful payment, you will receive a confirmation email with your ticket. Please ensure that your email address is accurate during the registration process."}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"3.4 Re-assigning tickets"}),"
",t(r.p,{children:["Tickets can be re-assigned to another person by contacting the organizers at ",n(r.a,{href:"mailto:what@wts.rocks",children:"what@wts.rocks"}),". Alternatively, you can re-assign your ticket to another person by changing the email address and contact details on via our HiEvents instance, using the ticket link."]}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"4. Cancellations and Refunds"}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"4.1 Organizer Cancellation"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"In the unlikely event that the conference is canceled by the organizers, ticket holders will receive a full refund. The organizers are not responsible for any additional expenses incurred by ticket holders."}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"4.2 Attendee Cancellation"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"All ticket sales are final, and no refunds will be issued for attendee cancellations."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"5. Code of Conduct"}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"5.1 Expected Behavior"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"All attendees, speakers, sponsors, and volunteers at the conference are required to agree with the code of conduct. Organizers will enforce this code throughout the event. We expect cooperation from all participants to help ensure a safe environment for everybody."}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"5.2 Unacceptable Behavior"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Harassment of any kind, including but not limited to verbal abuse, discrimination, and inappropriate physical contact, will not be tolerated. Any attendee violating these rules may be sanctioned or expelled from the conference without a refund at the discretion of the organizers."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"6. Liability"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"The organizers do not accept responsibility for any personal injury, loss, or damage to property during the event. Attendees are responsible for their own belongings."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"7. Privacy Policy"}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"7.1 Data Collection"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"By purchasing a ticket, you consent to the collection and processing of your personal data for the purposes of event registration and communication. This data may include your name, email address, and payment information."}),"
",n(r.h4,{children:"7.2 Data Usage"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Your personal data will be used to facilitate your attendance at the conference and to provide you with information about the event. Your data will not be shared with third parties without your explicit consent, except as required by law."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"8. Changes to Terms and Conditions"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"The organizers reserve the right to update and change these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on the official conference website, and it is your responsibility to review them periodically. We'll do our best to notify you of any changes in a timely manner."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"9. Consent to Recording"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"By attending the conference, you consent to being photographed, filmed, and recorded. These images, videos, and audio recordings may be used by the organizers for promotional and marketing purposes. If you do not wish to be photographed or recorded, please notify the organizers upon arrival, and they will provide you with a sign indicating your preference."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"10. Governing Law"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"The terms and conditions specifically related to the conference are governed by the laws of the Republic of Macedonia. Any disputes arising from or in connection with these conference-specific terms and conditions will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the Republic of Macedonia."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"11. Contact Information"}),"
",t(r.p,{children:["For any questions regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at:
",n(r.strong,{children:"CodePub LLC"}),"
Email: ",n(r.a,{href:"mailto:what@wts.rocks",children:"what@wts.rocks"}),"
Phone: +389 78 397 359
Address: 75 East 3rd Street Sheridan, WY 82801 United States"]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
